scene_description_enriched: A circular medallion depicts a male figure wearing a hat and a draped garment. He is shown in profile, with his left arm extended and his right hand raised, holding a small object. The background is dark and textured, with some lighter patches. Below the figure, there appear to be some animals or creatures. The overall scene is contained within a decorative border.
